Title: EPILEPTIC POWER: Stranded generation capacity hits 2,275MW in 5 years
Summary: Nigeria’s power supply crisis seems to be unabated . Stranded generation capacity rose by 1.19 per cent to 2,275 megawatts, MW, over a five-year period . As GenCos frown over 33.6% deficiency in evacuation .

Title: Banks report higher loan default rates in Q4’25
Summary: Banks have recorded an increase in loan defaults by households and corporates in the fourth quarter of 2025 . This reflects growing repayment pressures on consumers and businesses . The Central Bank of Nigeria’s (CBN) disclosed this in its Credit Conditions Survey .

Title: Nigeria’s oil output drops 8.3% to 1.544m bpd
Summary: Nigeria’s oil output, including condensate, dropped by 8.3 percent year-on-year (YoY) to 1.544 million bpd in December 2025 . The Commission did not provide reasons in its report .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, January 20, 2026
Summary: In the Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM), the Naira opened the trading day at approximately 1,419.37 per dollar .

Title: IMF upgrades Nigeria’s 2026 growth outlook to 4.4%
Summary: IMF upgrades Nigeria’s 2026 growth outlook to 4.4% in 2026 . IMF cites improved macroeconomic conditions and reform momentum . Fund disclosed this in its January 2026 World Economic Outlook (WEO) Update .

Title: ADC, Obidient collaboration will unseat APC – Odigie-Oyegun
Summary: Chief John Odigie-Oyegun has expressed confidence that the African Democratic Congress will dislodge the All Progressives Congress from power in 2027 . He spoke on Monday during the mass defection of members of the Obidient Movement into the ADC in Edo State . The development comes weeks after former Labour Party presidential candidate

Title: Abuja stadium to gulp N24bn from NSC’s N203bn budget
Summary: The upgrade of the Moshood Abiola National Stadium, Abuja, is expected to cost N24,642,000,000 from the N203,602,968,852 budget allocated to the National Sports Commission in the 2026 appropriation bill . The facility was opened in 2003 during the administration of former President Olusegun Ob

Title: Eagles soar to 26th, highest FIFA ranking in 16 years
Summary: The Super Eagles of Nigeria have climbed to 26th in the latest FIFA men’s world rankings, their highest position in 16 years . Hosts Morocco also broke into the top 10 for the first time since 1998, reflecting the significant impact of the tournament on African football . Title: Anambra nabs six illegal revenue collectors
Summary: Anambra State Government has arrested six illegal revenue collectors operating around the River Niger bridges and communities in the Ogbaru Local Government Area of the state . The suspects were apprehended on Monday at different locations during a coordinated operation, following investigations that revealed they had been extorting residents, transport operators, and investors under the guise of collecting lev

Title: 50th anniversary: A’Court lists 360 cases for speedy hearing
Summary: The President of the Court of Appeal, Justice Monica Dongban-Mensem, presided over a special court session in Lagos on Monday . 360 appeals have been listed for hearing before 16 panels made up of 48 Justices . The special sitting is part of activities marking the court’s golden jubilee .
